SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide

Details

Duration April 2023 - Now
My Role(s) Gameplay Designer
Platform PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch 2, PC
Engine Unreal Engine 5
Status In Development

Project Description

More to come soon

My Contribution

At Purple Lamp, I work as a Game Designer on SpongeBob SquarePants: Titans of the Tide, published by THQ Nordic.

My tasks on this project included:
  • Designing and prototyping core gameplay systems such as abilities, bosses, and 3Cs (character, camera, controls)
  • Creating prototypes using Blueprint (Unreal Engine) to quickly test and communicate gameplay ideas
  • Implementing gameplay logic and tuning features directly in-engine for designers and programmers
  • Contributing to cross-department workshops and documentation to align design vision and implementation
  • Owning boss encounters from concept to implementation in close collaboration with other departments
  • Supporting UI design during production and helping define structure and functionality
